entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He has to balance his homework with Quidditch practice and discussions with Wood.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: The Quidditch coach of Gryffindor House. He is constantly reminding Harry that he needs to catch the Snitch only if they are more than 50 points up.

entities.name: gryffindor house
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. They are obsessed with winning the Quidditch Cup.

entities.name: slytherin house
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. They are leading the tournament by exactly 200 points.

entities.name: quidditch cup
entities.description: The trophy that Gryffindor House is trying to win. It has not been won by Gryffindor since Charlie Weasley's time.

entities.name: charlie weasley
entities.description: A legendary Quidditch player who played for Gryffindor House. He is Ron's second oldest brother.

relationships.description: Harry is a member of Gryffindor House.
Wood is the Quidditch coach of Gryffindor House.
Slytherin House is leading the tournament by exactly 200 points.
Harry must catch the Snitch only if Gryffindor House is more than 50 points up.
